question: A National level Rural Technical Festival called 'Antahpragnya 2020' was recently organised in which Indian state/UT?
explanation:
A National Level Rural Technical Festival titled \'Antahpragnya 2020\' was recently organised in the state of Telangana at Rajiv Gandhi University of Knowledge Technologies-Basar (RGUKT-Basar). This is the countryâ€™s biggest technical festival. 
The three-day technical fest was conducted with the theme \'Spot and encourage rural tech innovators\'. It hosted more than 200 technical events including Campus Farming competition, Robo Racing, Development of Ideal Villages and National Science Fair. Nearly 50,000 people from nearby places and institutions participated in the event.
